summary: The module offers a set of utilities for communicating with the Internet Archive service, retrieving item data, and converting that raw metadata into a structured edition representation suitable for Open Library. It includes a class that assembles edition fields, handles ISBNs, list values, validation, and status checks, as well as helper functions for accessing various IA endpoints such as manifests, cover images, and status information.
business_intent: Enable Open Library to synchronize and enrich its catalog by pulling book records from archive.org, validating the information, and mapping it into Open Library edition records for display, search, and lending purposes.
